entry.def: Croquettes are small amounts of mashed potato or meat rolled in breadcrumbs and fried.

means.word_mean: 1. minced cooked meats (or vegetables) in thick white sauce; breaded and deep-fried

auth_sentence.content: Dredge each croquette first in the flour, then dip them in the egg, then roll it in the breadcrumbs until completely coated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dredge each croquette first in the flour, then dip them in the egg, then roll it in the breadcrumbs until completely coated.

auth_sentence.content: For the croquette coating, sprinkle the seasoned flour onto a plate and beat the egg in a bowl.
